pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • 64bit OS required
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Quad-core
  • Memory: 8Gb Ram
  • Hard Disk Space: 5gig
  • Video Card: Dedicated graphics card with 2 GB of RAM minimum, OpenGL 2.1 and GLSL 1.2 support (generally 2012 or newer)
  • Sound: FMOD compatible sound card

Минимальные:
  • ОС: Win 10
  • Процессор: Intel Core i5-7600 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Оперативная память: 16 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • Место на диске: 80 GB

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 /8.1 /10 64bit
  • Процессор: Intel Core i3 2100 or AMD A8-6500
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 VRAM 2GB or AMD Radeon R9 270X VRAM 2GB
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 50 GB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX® 11 supported
  • Дополнительно: Mouse, keyboard and game pad (XInput only). Screen resolution: 1280x720. This product only supports MS-IME keyboard input. There is a possibility that other IME will not function correctly with it.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 8.1 /10 64bit
  • Процессор: Intel Core i5 4670 or AMD A10-7850K
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 VRAM 4GB or AMD Radeon R9 380X VRAM 4GB
  • DirectX: Версии 11

  • Дополнительно: Mouse, keyboard and game pad (XInput only). Screen resolution: 1920x1080. Depending on the monitor and PC graphics card environment and setup used, this title can expand its display resolution to 4K. However, please be aware that 4K resolutions are not officially supported. This product only supports MS-IME keyboard input. There is a possibility that other IME will not function correctly with it.
